alert.note: Alert for Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 6:14PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tarrant County through 700 PM CDT... At 613 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Watauga, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Worth, Arlington, Euless, Bedford, Haltom City, Keller, Hurst, Southlake, Watauga, Colleyville, Benbrook, Saginaw, White Settlement, Forest Hill, Richland Hills, River Oaks, Kennedale, Sansom Park, Lake Worth and Eagle Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
